channel.title: Sprite Appearance on Educational material for LSU Programming Digital Media

item.title: Animations & Images
item.description: Adding files into a P5 project The first thing we have to do before adding an image to our sprite is to include it inside of P5. This can be done in two different ways, but they function almost identically. Looking at the examplel on the previous page, we can see the photoDirectory varible contains a string for a URL. This is the location on the internet where the photos are located.
